channel.title: I have a problem with the way that drums are tuned
channel.description: I have a chromatic project that is in the key of D# minor while the settings key is set to G Minor. A note which is not in my key. Hence, my drums sound a bit off (they are tuned to the root) and I dont know how to tune them to the key of the song without painfully going through each of my 80+ scenes and manually transposing all of them up one note so that G is in the key. Any suggestions on how to fix this? @Auxy are all drums tuned to the key or is it just some tonal percussion?
